citations.desc: ACCESS AND INSPECTION OF RECORDS AND PROPERTY; SUBMISSION OF ITINERARIES.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 2:15pm on
01/13/2015. The facility representative present had prior obligations to attend to and could not accompany the
inspector.
